title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 484.2 - Subpoenas
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 484.2 - Subpoenas

State Regulations
(a) The
superintendent, and if designated by the superintendent, the first deputy
superintendent, chief inspector, or counsel, shall have the power to issue
subpoenas and subpoenas duces tecum requiring persons to appear before a
designated division commissioned officer and be examined with reference to a
matter within the scope of the administrative personnel investigation being
conducted, and to produce books, payrolls, personnel records, correspondence, documents, papers, or any other evidence relating to such
investigation. (b) The fees payable
to individuals required to be examined shall be the same as in the case of a
subpoena issued by a court of record. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
484.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
